definition: to subdue/to check/to bring under control/(in former times) what one is allowed to wear depending on social status/uniform (army, party, school etc)/livery (for company employees)/CL:套[tao4]
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes
tweed cloth (used for military uniforms etc)

sentences.english: Jack subdues the suspect but realizes Hampton has been shot.
sentences.chinese: 傑克制服了嫌犯，但他發現傑西被子彈擊中了。

sentences.english: Why are you wearing a different unifomp3?
sentences.chinese: 你怎麼穿了一身不同的制服呢？

sentences.english: They are often more comfortable and more durable than civilian clothes.
sentences.chinese: 還可以減稅，制服更比素人裝扮舒服和耐穿。

sentences.english: What is the percentage of scouts to the total members of the four uniform teams?
sentences.chinese: 童軍的人數佔這四個制服團體總人數的幾分之幾？

sentences.english: The gondoliers wore green and white livery and silver plaques on their chest.
sentences.chinese: 船伕們穿着白綠兩色的制服，胸前彆着銀質徽章。

sentences.english: She also looked good in a CSI uniform.
sentences.chinese: 她在《犯罪現場調查》裏穿制服也很好看。

sentences.english: The river was brought under control.
Kostya did not know what the uniform signified, but it looked official.
sentences.chinese: 克斯特亞不知道那是什麼制服，但它看上去很正式。

sentences.english: The toolkit also has ideas to control baboons.
sentences.chinese: 該工具包同樣有制服狒狒進犯的辦法。

sentences.english: We ironed our best uniforms, sharing one electric iron.
sentences.chinese: 我們共用一個電熨斗，熨好了我們最好的制服。

sentences.english: He smiled to himself while he put his uniform jacket on.
sentences.chinese: 他兀自笑着，把制服穿上。

sentences.english: He looks great in his uniform.
sentences.chinese: 他穿他的制服看起來極妙。

sentences.english: I'm going to go guard the Queen and stand outside the palace in my tunic.
sentences.chinese: 我要去守衛女王，穿着制服站在宮殿外。

sentences.english: Their gray uniforms were worn beyond the point of shabbiness.
sentences.chinese: 他們灰色的制服已經破爛不堪。

sentences.english: Standing near a newsstand was a woman in a uniform.
sentences.chinese: 在報攤附近站着一個身穿制服的女人。

sentences.english: Mrs Li is buying this uniform.
sentences.chinese: 李夫人正在買這件制服。
